content:
"Schitt's Creek" is a heartwarming show that's easy to fit into your evening routine. The episodes are around 22 minutes long, which is perfect for a relaxing evening wind-down. You can easily fit in an episode or two before bed, depending on your schedule.

Since you're used to watching TV in the evening, you can simply replace your usual evening show with "Schitt's Creek." The show's tone is calming and uplifting, making it an excellent choice for unwinding before bed.

If you're worried about fitting it into your routine, you could try watching an episode during dinner or right after, depending on your schedule. The show is light-hearted and easy to follow, so you can easily pick up where you left off if you need to take a break.

Remember, the goal is to make TV time a relaxing and enjoyable experience, so feel free to adjust your routine as needed. You can always adjust the time or pace of your watching to fit your mood and schedule.

Let me know what you think of "Schitt's Creek" once you've watched a few episodes! I'd love to hear your thoughts and discuss the show with you.
